backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, challenge sessions, ICP transactions, and access-controlled query/update methods for leaderboard, profiles, competition state, and session storage.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder containing no feature entries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of all major frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, pages, hooks, and app structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and base styling utilities.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, backend actor loading, profile retrieval, error handling, and navigation between core pages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, branding, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing app branding, navigation buttons, user info, and admin access based on profile and permissions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with first-user admin logic, validation, and success/error messaging.
frontend/src/components/SendICPPrizeModa: Modal component for sending ICP prizes, handling input validation, transaction mutation, and success UI state.
frontend/src/config/appIdentity.ts: Resolves the app canister principal and derives its account ID using environment variables and ICP utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and managing login/logout flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, sessions, challenge data, and ICP prize sending via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining dark/light theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/accountId.ts: Implements ICP account identifier derivation from a principal using SHA-224 and CRC32 per spec.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin interface showing competition state, canister identity, balances, and transactions with controls for toggling the competition and sending prizes.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a sorted global leaderboard with rank icons and allows returning to the main menu.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity and showing a preview of the public leaderboard plus feature highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenu.tsx: Main navigation menu letting users start challenges, view stats, manage wallet, or open the leaderboard.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Shows user statistics including totals, averages, and a table of past challenge sessions.
frontend/src/pages/TypingChallenge.tsx: Implements the multiâ€‘level typing challenge with timers, metrics calculation, progress tracking, and session submission.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: React wallet page showing ICP balance, generating account IDs, and handling withdrawal form actions with clipboard support.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines the UserProfile TypeScript interface aligned with backend types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config extending colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining backend-only fix requests, issues, and architectural notes.
